courseDescription:
This free online course, Business Etiquette and Professionalism, will provide you with an understanding of the basics of business etiquette and professionalism in the workplace. You will learn about the principles of professional behavior. You will be able to explain what etiquette is and learn how to always be your best when meeting and greeting people. You will also learn about the different types of interviews, how to plan for an interview and what happens during the interview process.

This free online course then explains how to plan and attend business meetings. You will learn about the different types of meetings and how to plan for a conference call meeting or a meal meeting. You will also learn about electronic etiquette and how it relates to voicemail and instant messaging.

This free online business etiquette course then wraps up multicultural etiquette and how it is related to todayâ€™s diverse workforce. You will also learn five steps to dealing with cultural diversity. By studying this online course you will learn about good manners at the workplace and how to be better prepared for working in a professional business environment. So why wait? Start this online course today and perfect your knowledge and experience on business etiquette and professionalism.
